message:
I need help

How to shield a house from a nearby mobile cell towers  ?

data.message: What does that mean? You have health worries? You are getting interference from other networks you don't use? You want to block all mobile use? Or what?
health
aluminum foil paper, but take care cause it would actually isolate you from outer world i.e. it would absorb any electromagnetic radiation including the ones used by your cell operator :D
you can test it by wrapping your phone with it then trying to call it, it will be out of coverage  :)
how to apply the foil paper without getting an image that strengthen the signal  (image theory used in antennas ) , and how to apply it to a decoration (already built house )

yes basically it would work like a very large antenna that would absorb any electromagnetic radiation, you can simply get rid of the accumulated charge by grounding it :) For decoration, I'm not an expert in this field so you use your imagination :D maybe attach it to the walls then spray it with any paint, it will look like as if you are living in a space ship :P
another idea is to use fence wire mesh... sample principle..
so the answer is to build a building a faraday cage

another thing, did you check the building structure? i.e. the amount of steel used in the roofs? it have the same effect that's why you get bad reception in bathrooms for example because they use more steel in bathrooms roofs..
yep :)

before you start investing in the solution, I guess you should verify that you have a problem in the first place, maybe you are already shielded or maybe the signal wattage is too low to do any harm..

theoretically the distance between the cell tower and building is more than safe according to law, but does not mean that the towers operate at legal power ranges, and the building's residence think other wise, after couple of years long exposure is has its towe, so a solution will put them into a good  psychological state of mind.
well, instead of subjective residents opinion, invest in some objective measurements, at least by then you will have a case that no one can debunk by simple bullshit talk..
Egyptian way: gather all your neighbours and destroy the tower
but not the geeky way
ghalef el mbna be wara2 foil modad lel takol we el 7asharat we 2st7'dm silk 3'asil ma3dan mish el 2sfng
http://www.amazon.com/Electromagnetic-Radiation-Detector-Dosimeter-Tester/dp/B007DDGYF2
You might find this product interesting, at least to be able to quantify if there is an actual danger or mild one..

I've once read some article online explaining that EM radiation coming out of a neon lamp or a plasma TV far more exceeds in terms of wattage the ones you are actually receiving from cell towers.. 

Also if this would make you more comfortable the idea of cellular networks is it have several cells in order to reuse a certain band of frequencies and these cells gets smaller in congested areas like in Cairo for example so they can't use high amplification wattage otherwise they will interfere with nearby cells from the same operator that happens to be reusing the same wave frequency.. so even if the country laws allows it, the technology it self won't make it possible to use extremely high wattage specially in Cairo since the cells are very small compared to other areas..

after all, don't take my word for it, just take actual measures instead of guessing or using some anecdotal evidence.. in the end, being worried and stressed could be much more dangerous to your health than the EM radiation you are worried about that you would be actually associating its symptoms to the towers wrongfully..
Blow up the tower :)
